MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KA9 postcode area of Prestwick. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10:30pm to safely carry out work on an underground cable on Carradale Drive and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1.30am. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:08pm on 20th November 2020.
